definitions.text: a painful emotion resulting from an awareness of inadequacy or guilt

examples: one mistake brought shame to all his family
suffered the ignominy of being sent to prison
it's a pity he couldn't do it
he dishonored his family by committing a serious crime

definitions.text: compel through a sense of shame
examples: She shamed him into making amends

definitions.text: surpass or beat by a wide margin
